summary: Changes all lutes to look like actual lutes.  Also made playable.
descriptionHtml:
This is my first mod.  I know that there are mistakes but I already spent more time working on it than I would have liked.  Just extract the files to where they need to go.  If you don\'t have a particular folder, just add it.



Update... about 2 mins after first uploading. :)
    To get the playable lute, go to any general vender and buy the Bard Lute.  It is under apparel.   Equip it and have fun.     Also, I do not know how to change the body movement to avoid collision, so depending on your body type and armor, there maybe some.     



This mod is based off of Bard\'s Lute by demidekidasu.  Thanks! [url=http://www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23216]Bard\'s Lute[/url]

And a huge thanks to Foxtails32 and Nightasy for making tutorials aimed at noobs.
author: mlocascio
